page.content: LARKHALL SOCIAL CONCERNS ONE OF THE MAIN SOURCES OF SOCIAL PROBLEMS IS THE ABUSE OF ALCOHOL AND DRUGS.ALCOHOLISM AND HEAVY DRINKING ARE LONG STANDING PROBLEMS BUT DRUG TAKING IS A NEW PHENOMENON AFFECTING YOUNG PEOPLE IN PARTICULAR.THE AVERAGE AGE OF ADULTS TAKING HARD DRUGS e.g HEROIN,IS 22.THIS IS BECAUSE IT'S VERY EXPENSIVE AND THE MAY HAVE TO SPEND UP TO Â£30 PER DAY.THIS IS UNLIKE GLUE SNIFFING WHICH IS VERY CHEAP AND SO IS POPULAR WITH THE 13-18 AGE GROUP ALTHOUGH THERE ARE ALSO PEOPLE OF 30_40 WHO SNIFF GLUE. THE ABUSE OF DRUGS OR ALCOHOL LEADS TO ABOUT 60% OF CRIME.THIS IS MOSTLY THEFT TO FINANCE THEIR HABITS ,BUT SOME ALCOHOL RELATED CRIMES ARE CAUSED WHILE UNDER THE INFLUENCE OF DRINK.AS GLUE SNIFFING IS STILL LEGAL POLICE MUST REFER THESE YOUNGSTERS TO OUTSIDE AGENCIES.
